title: Comedy Nights with Kapil - Raveena ke saath Yaariyan - 12th Jan
description:
[center][b]Comedy Nights with Kapil - Raveena ke saath Yaariyan - 12th Jan HQ 720p


Season 1 Ep. 44
Released: 12/01/14
Running time: 58:40

This episode starts with Kapil shooting his one liners about New Year Resolutions and has the audience falling of the edge of their seats, laughing. Kapil then asks the audience to share their resolutions and starts commenting on their views. He then says that he has taken a resolution of not fighting with his wife. Suddenly, his wife steps on the stage and is surprised by the new, Kapil. The director and star cast of - Yaariyan, comes on the stage to promote their film. Raveena Tandon walks on to stage, once the cast of Yaariyan leaves. Watch episode and have a fun filled ride with Kapil and others.

Renowned, actor-comedian Kapil Sharma makes his debut as a TV show producer with his new show Comedy Nights With Kapil. He will be seen multiple roles of an actor, scriptwriter and producer in his production debut. Already famous for his amazing comic timing and his talent to dig humor out of any situation, he is ready present everyday life in a fresh ad unique way.
